member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetCustomService
member.summary: This class stores custom validation criteria for record's data.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetCustomService.CreateRecord(FileCabinetApp.RecordDataArgs)
member.summary: Creates a new record.
member.param: The data of a new record.
member.returns: The unique Id of the created record.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetCustomService.GetRecords
member.summary: Gets all records.
member.returns: The array of all records.

member.summary: Gets a record with a specific Id.
member.returns: The record with a matching Id.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetCustomService.GetStat
member.summary: Gets the amount of records.

member.summary: Edits a record with a specific Id.
member.param: The data of a new record.
member.exception: Thrown if "record" is null.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetCustomService.FindByFirstName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds records with the same first name.
member.returns: The array of records with the same first name.
member.exception: Thrown if the parameter "firstName" is null or contains only white spaces.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetCustomService.FindByLastName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds records with the same last name.
member.returns: The array of records with the same last name.
member.exception: Thrown if the parameter "lastName" is null or contains only white spaces.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetCustomService.FindByDateOfBirth(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Finds records with the same date of birth.
member.returns: The array of records with the same date of birth.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetCustomService.ValidateParameters(FileCabinetApp.RecordDataArgs)
member.summary: Validates record's data using default criteria.
member.param: The data of a new record.
member.exception: Thrown if the parameters "FirstName" or "lastName" are null or contain only white spaces.
Thrown if the parameters "FirstName" or "LastName" shorter than 2 characters or longer than 30 characters.
Thrown if the parameter "DateOfBirth" is earlier than 01.01.1920 or later than the current date.
Thrown if the parameters "AreaCode" and "Savings" are less than 0.
Thrown if the parameter "Gender" is not equal 'F' or 'M'.
